|RefSeq=NM_001172 |UniProt=P78540 |PDB= }} 'Arginase' is a manganese-containing
enzyme. The reaction catalyzed by this enzyme is: arginine + H 2O â
ornithine + urea. It is the final enzyme of the urea cycle.
